name: SUBSYST Simulator (Whalebot)
description:
Play as a food producer, secure food for your city and adapt to cataclysms in this clicking game! Manage resources and visualize your impact on the environment.

The Subsyst Simulator is designed to raise awareness about challenges in food production and consumption, and the potential of cities to reduce their CO2-footprint.

Instructions
  1. Choose whether to play yourself or have one of 5 bots with a different agenda play out the game. 

Enjoy!

All the best, INTUIT Team

The game is currently under a rehaul and many features are under reconstruction.
